additional_barcode.description: List of additional barcodes. Note that the first one appears in the main barcode field.

additional_person_name.description: The name of an additional contact.

agree_to_copyright_terms.description: Indication whether the requester has agreed to the copyright terms. Mandatory for borrowing requests. Currently not relevant for lending requests.

allow_other_formats.description: Indication whether other formats besides the value in format field are acceptable. Default is false.

author_initials.description: Author initials of the requested resource.

bib_note.description: The note of the bibliographic record.

call_number.description: The call number of the book. Indicates the library shelf on which the books are located.

chapter.description: The chapter number in the journal that contains the article.

chapter_author.description: For a book chapter, the author of this chapter.

chapter_title.description: For a book chapter, the title of this chapter.

citation_type.description: Type of the requested resource. For example, book or article. Mandatory for borrowing requests. Mandatory when creating a lending request unless mms_id is supplied. For borrowing requests, possible codes are listed in 'PhysicalReadingListCitationTypes' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API): BK / CR. For lending requests, possible codes are listed in PR_CitationType [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API): BOOK / JOURNAL.

copyright_status.description: The copyright status of the request. Relevant if requested format is Digital, and 'rs_borrower_copyright_management' in customer parameters is true. Possible options are listed in 'ResourceSharingCopyrightsStatus' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API), default is generated per request. Relevant for GET, POST and PUT of borrowing requests, and GET of lending requests.

doi.description: The doi of the requested resource.

edition.description: The edition of the requested resource.

editor.description: The editor of the book (typically used for books where chapters have different authors).

end_page.description: The end page of the requested resource.

external_id.description: External identifier of the resource sharing request. Mandatory when creating a lending request.

format.description: Format of the resource requested. For example, physical or digital. Mandatory. Possible codes are listed in RequestFormats [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

fund.description: The code of the fund. Not relevant for lending requests.

has_active_notes.description: Indication whether the request has active notes. Output parameter.

issue.description: The issue of the requested resource.

journal_title.description: The title of the journal. Relevant when an article is requested.

last_interest_date.description: Last date the request is needed. Optional.

last_modified_date.description: Date by which the last change to the request was made.

last_modified_time.description: Time by which the last change to the request was made.

lcc_number.description: The library of congress number of the book.

level_of_service.description: The code of the resource sharing request Level of Service. Possible options are listed in 'LevelOfService' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API), default is generated per request.

maximum_fee.description: Maximum fee the user is willing to pay for the request. Currently not relevant for lending requests.

mms_id.description: MMS ID of the requested resource. Borrowing request: this is relevant after physical material has arrived. Lending request: if supplied when creating a request, the request will be attached to this bib record. See [GET BIB API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/bibs/GET/gwPcGly021om4RTvtjbPleCklCGxeYAf3JPdiJpJhUA=/af2fb69d-64f4-42bc-bb05-d8a0ae56936e).

need_patron_info.description: Indication whether patron information is needed. Not relevant for lending requests.

oclc_number.description: The oclc number of the book.

other_standard_id.description: The other standard id of the requested resource.

owner.description: The resource sharing library code. See [Get libraries API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4Dp4I8TKv6CAxBlD4LyRaVE=/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed). Borrowing request: Optional. Used only when there are more than one resource sharing library defined for the user. Lending request: Mandatory.

pages.description: The relevant pages of the requested resource.

part.description: The part of the requested resource.

partner.description: The code of the partner related to this request. See [Get partners API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/partners/GET/gwPcGly021piAVNPLaef7suP1zfa6Lui/8883ef41-c3b8-4792-9ff8-cb6b729d6e07). Mandatory when creating a lending request.

pickup_location.description: The pickup library code where the resource will be delivered. Relevant and mandatory for physical format delivery Borrowing request. Optional for digital format. Not relevant for lending requests.

pickup_location_type.description: The pickup location type. The pickup location type. Possible values are: LIBRARY, CIRCULATION_DESK.

place_of_publication.description: The publication place of the requested resource.

pmid.description: The pmid of the requested resource.

preferred_send_method.description: Preferred send method. Possible options are listed in 'ResourceSharingRequestSendMethod' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Currently not relevant for lending requests.

printed.description: Indication whether the request is printed. Output parameter. Relevant for lending requests.

reading_room.description: The code of the reading room where the item will be picked up. Mandatory when for_reading_room_only is true. Not relevant for lending requests.

remote_record_id.description: The remote record id of the requested resource.

reported.description: Indication whether the request is reported. Output parameter. Relevant for lending requests.

request_id.description: Internal identifier of the resource sharing request in Alma, generated by Alma. Should be used in subsequent queries regarding the request.

requested_language.description: The requested language for the resource sharing request. Possible codes are the enabled fields in ResourceSharingLanguages [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Default is null.

requested_media.description: A description of the requested media. possible values are 1-7 (codes from request media code table), and the codes from 'AdditionalRequestedMedia' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). The valid values are according to the Requested media definition mapping table.

requester.description: The primary identifier and full name of the requesting user. Relevant for borrowing requests. Not relevant for lending requests.

rs_note.description: List of related notes that appear in the Notes tab in the UI..

created_date.description: The creation date of the note. Default is the current date.

series_title_number.description: The series title number of the requested resource.

currency.description: The currency. Possible values are listed in 'Currency_CT' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

source.description: The source of the requested resource.

specific_edition.description: Indication whether edition is used in ISO Protocol and in Locate process. Default is true. Relevant when a book is requested.

start_page.description: The relevant start page of the requested resource.

status.description: The resource sharing request status. Borrowing request: Possible codes are listed in MandatoryBorrowingWorkflowSteps or OptionalBorrowingWorkflowSteps [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Lending request: Possible codes are listed in MandatoryLendingWorkflowSteps or OptionalLendingWorkflowSteps [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

supplied_format.description: Format of the supplied item. For example, physical or digital. Possible codes are listed in RequestFormats [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Relevant only after the request is supplied.

text_email.description: Borrowing request: In use with alternative_address only. In use when sending in digital format. Lending request: Requester's Email.

text_postal_1.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_2.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_3.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_4.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

title.description: Title of the requested resource. Mandatory unless mms_id is supplied.

use_alternative_address.description: An indication of whether the delivery should be to an alternative address. Default is false. Not relevant for lending requests.

user_request.description: The request linked to the resource sharing request. Borrowing requests: this is the related user request. Lending requests: this is the move/digitization request (if exists). See [GET user's request API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/users/GET/gwPcGly021r0XQMGAttqcPPFoLNxBoEZbQsUC/MWTX7aNWi0EYKYFUfYyI8KvpG73JPdiJpJhUA=/0aa8d36f-53d6-48ff-8996-485b90b103e4).

volume.description: The volume number of the journal that contains the article.

willing_to_pay.description: Indication whether patron is willing to pay. Currently not relevant for lending requests.

year.description: Publication date of the requested resource.

bib_note.description: The note of the bibliographic record.

call_number.description: The call number of the book. Indicates the library shelf on which the books are located.

chapter.description: The chapter number in the journal that contains the article.

chapter_author.description: For a book chapter, the author of this chapter.

chapter_title.description: For a book chapter, the title of this chapter.

citation_type.description: Type of the requested resource. For example, book or article. Mandatory for borrowing requests. Mandatory when creating a lending request unless mms_id is supplied. For borrowing requests, possible codes are listed in 'PhysicalReadingListCitationTypes' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API): BK / CR. For lending requests, possible codes are listed in PR_CitationType [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API): BOOK / JOURNAL.

copyright_status.description: The copyright status of the request. Relevant if requested format is Digital, and 'rs_borrower_copyright_management' in customer parameters is true. Possible options are listed in 'ResourceSharingCopyrightsStatus' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API), default is generated per request. Relevant for GET, POST and PUT of borrowing requests, and GET of lending requests.

doi.description: The doi of the requested resource.

edition.description: The edition of the requested resource.

editor.description: The editor of the book (typically used for books where chapters have different authors).

end_page.description: The end page of the requested resource.

external_id.description: External identifier of the resource sharing request. Mandatory when creating a lending request.

format.description: Format of the resource requested. For example, physical or digital. Mandatory. Possible codes are listed in RequestFormats [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

fund.description: The code of the fund. Not relevant for lending requests.

has_active_notes.description: Indication whether the request has active notes. Output parameter.

issue.description: The issue of the requested resource.

journal_title.description: The title of the journal. Relevant when an article is requested.

last_interest_date.description: Last date the request is needed. Optional.

last_modified_date.description: Date by which the last change to the request was made.

last_modified_time.description: Time by which the last change to the request was made.

lcc_number.description: The library of congress number of the book.

level_of_service.description: The code of the resource sharing request Level of Service. Possible options are listed in 'LevelOfService' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API), default is generated per request.

maximum_fee.description: Maximum fee the user is willing to pay for the request. Currently not relevant for lending requests.

mms_id.description: MMS ID of the requested resource. Borrowing request: this is relevant after physical material has arrived. Lending request: if supplied when creating a request, the request will be attached to this bib record. See [GET BIB API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/bibs/GET/gwPcGly021om4RTvtjbPleCklCGxeYAf3JPdiJpJhUA=/af2fb69d-64f4-42bc-bb05-d8a0ae56936e).

need_patron_info.description: Indication whether patron information is needed. Not relevant for lending requests.

oclc_number.description: The oclc number of the book.

other_standard_id.description: The other standard id of the requested resource.

owner.description: The resource sharing library code. See [Get libraries API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4Dp4I8TKv6CAxBlD4LyRaVE=/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed). Borrowing request: Optional. Used only when there are more than one resource sharing library defined for the user. Lending request: Mandatory.

pages.description: The relevant pages of the requested resource.

part.description: The part of the requested resource.

partner.description: The code of the partner related to this request. See [Get partners API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/partners/GET/gwPcGly021piAVNPLaef7suP1zfa6Lui/8883ef41-c3b8-4792-9ff8-cb6b729d6e07). Mandatory when creating a lending request.

pickup_location.description: The pickup library code where the resource will be delivered. Relevant and mandatory for physical format delivery Borrowing request. Optional for digital format. Not relevant for lending requests.

pickup_location_type.description: The pickup location type. The pickup location type. Possible values are: LIBRARY, CIRCULATION_DESK.

place_of_publication.description: The publication place of the requested resource.

pmid.description: The pmid of the requested resource.

preferred_send_method.description: Preferred send method. Possible options are listed in 'ResourceSharingRequestSendMethod' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Currently not relevant for lending requests.

printed.description: Indication whether the request is printed. Output parameter. Relevant for lending requests.

reading_room.description: The code of the reading room where the item will be picked up. Mandatory when for_reading_room_only is true. Not relevant for lending requests.

remote_record_id.description: The remote record id of the requested resource.

reported.description: Indication whether the request is reported. Output parameter. Relevant for lending requests.

request_id.description: Internal identifier of the resource sharing request in Alma, generated by Alma. Should be used in subsequent queries regarding the request.

requested_language.description: The requested language for the resource sharing request. Possible codes are the enabled fields in ResourceSharingLanguages [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Default is null.

requested_media.description: A description of the requested media. possible values are 1-7 (codes from request media code table), and the codes from 'AdditionalRequestedMedia' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). The valid values are according to the Requested media definition mapping table.

requester.description: The primary identifier and full name of the requesting user. Relevant for borrowing requests. Not relevant for lending requests.

rs_note.description: List of related notes that appear in the Notes tab in the UI..

created_date.description: The creation date of the note. Default is the current date.

series_title_number.description: The series title number of the requested resource.

currency.description: The currency. Possible values are listed in 'Currency_CT' [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

source.description: The source of the requested resource.

specific_edition.description: Indication whether edition is used in ISO Protocol and in Locate process. Default is true. Relevant when a book is requested.

start_page.description: The relevant start page of the requested resource.

status.description: The resource sharing request status. Borrowing request: Possible codes are listed in MandatoryBorrowingWorkflowSteps or OptionalBorrowingWorkflowSteps [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Lending request: Possible codes are listed in MandatoryLendingWorkflowSteps or OptionalLendingWorkflowSteps [code tables](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API).

supplied_format.description: Format of the supplied item. For example, physical or digital. Possible codes are listed in RequestFormats [code table](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/blog/Working-with-the-code-tables-API). Relevant only after the request is supplied.

text_email.description: Borrowing request: In use with alternative_address only. In use when sending in digital format. Lending request: Requester's Email.

text_postal_1.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_2.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_3.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

text_postal_4.description: In use with alternative_address only. Not relevant for lending requests.

title.description: Title of the requested resource. Mandatory unless mms_id is supplied.

use_alternative_address.description: An indication of whether the delivery should be to an alternative address. Default is false. Not relevant for lending requests.

user_request.description: The request linked to the resource sharing request. Borrowing requests: this is the related user request. Lending requests: this is the move/digitization request (if exists). See [GET user's request API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/users/GET/gwPcGly021r0XQMGAttqcPPFoLNxBoEZbQsUC/MWTX7aNWi0EYKYFUfYyI8KvpG73JPdiJpJhUA=/0aa8d36f-53d6-48ff-8996-485b90b103e4).

volume.description: The volume number of the journal that contains the article.

willing_to_pay.description: Indication whether patron is willing to pay. Currently not relevant for lending requests.

year.description: Publication date of the requested resource.

items.description: Requested resource to be picked from the shelf.

copy.description: Copies of resource in a specific location.

items.description: Specific copy of resource in a specific location.

holding_id.description: Holding pid, a unique holding id that the resource is associated with.

library.description: Library of the requested resource. See [Get libraries API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4Dp4I8TKv6CAxBlD4LyRaVE=/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

comment.description: The related note of the request.
comment.example: your request is important to us

destination.description: The destination will be a library in most cases. However, it may at times be: A circulation desk (when the pickup location is a reading room) A Home/Office code, where the request is for personal delivery A Work Order department

id.description: The identifier of the request in Alma.

printed.description: Indication whether the request is printed.

reported.description: Indication whether the request is reported.

request_date.description: Deprecated - use request_time instead. The request date.

request_sub_type.description: The sub type of the request.

request_time.description: The creation date and exact time of the request. Output parameter.

author.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

mms_id.description: The MMS id of the resource. See [GET BIB API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/bibs/GET/gwPcGly021om4RTvtjbPleCklCGxeYAf3JPdiJpJhUA=/af2fb69d-64f4-42bc-bb05-d8a0ae56936e).

publication_year.description: The year associated with the publication of the resource.

publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

title.example: Sources of the self : the making of the modern identity / Charles Taylor.

total_record_count.description: The total number of requested resources.

copy.description: Copies of resource in a specific location.

items.description: Specific copy of resource in a specific location.
